Our Private School meets very strict standards. Join Now!

Explore our School

Welcome to Horizon Private School – American Branch (HPS-Br.), a co-educational school with a student-centered approach at every level. This is defined by the manner in which we educate, mentor, and encourage our students and provide them with an exceptional learning experience that is inspiring and empowering.

HPS-Br. is a community in the heart of Khalifa City and was rated ‘Very Good’ during the Irtiqaa /ADEK inspection in 2019.

The school encourages students to reach for their dreams, try something new, be ambitious, and above all, be lifelong learners and distinguished global citizens.

Broaden Your Child’s Unique Horizon

Providing an inclusive American education for ages 3 till 18, Pre-KG up to Grade 12

Play Video

AMAL SHAHINE - PRINCIPAL

"At Horizon Private School - American Branch, we strive to be a second home for our students, a place where they are nurtured and encouraged to grow both academically and socially.

We celebrate our success when we see the smile on the students’ faces and feel that they are enjoying their learning at our school. We want them to leave Horizon as life-long learners!."

ACADEMICS

KINDERGARTEN

( PRE-KG, KG1 & KG2)

Starting Kindergarten is always a fun and exciting time. Our youngest students at Horizon Private School – American Branch enjoy a safe and happy environment where they are engaged in learning through a variety of activities.

LOWER ELEMENTARY

(Grades 1-2)

Moving from the comfort of kindergarten to lower elementary is a big step for any six-year-old. Our teachers work closely with parents to ensure that the move is a seamless one allowing each child to grow naturally within their new surroundings.

Upper Elementary

(Grade 3-5)

In upper elementary at Horizon Private School – American Branch, our students are exposed to an environment in which they thrive and grow into independent learners. Their learning will be enriched with activities planned to ensure the school values are instilled in every student.

MIDDLE SCHOOL

(Grades 6-8)

As our students embark on their Middle School years, our teachers lay down the framework to ensure academic rigor. Coupled with this, we provide ample opportunities for students to nurture their talent and creativity through regular activities.

HIGH SCHOOL

(Grades 9-12)

Starting at High School (Grades 9-12) High School is a very important time in any student’s academic journey, and at Horizon Private School – American Branch we give our students every opportunity to take charge of their learning. While student outcomes remain a key focus, we understand the importance of grooming successful young adults who are lifelong learners and are ready to become the leaders of the future.

CURRICULUM

At home with the traditions and culture of the UAE and embracing the best of current educational practices within the American Curriculum (Common Core State Standards), HPS-Br. carries the interests of each child at the heart of everything it does.

LANGUAGES

At HPS - Br., we are proud to offer a comprehensive language curriculum that includes Arabic, English, and French. Our programs are designed to support students from preschool to grade 12, fostering fluency and literacy in these three global languages. Our language programs reflect our commitment to preparing students for a multicultural world, where communication and understanding bridge the gaps between diverse societies.

BLENDED LEARNING &

TECHNOLOGY INTEGRATION

Horizon Private School - American Branch is successfully implementing a Blended Learning Model that mixes paper-based instruction, hands-on activities, self-paced digital learning, ebooks, and the latest apps and educational trends.

AP COURSES

What is AP? The Advanced Placement (AP) program gives students the opportunity to tackle college-level work while still in High School. This allows them to be better prepared for college and, in some cases, earn college credits once they pass the AP exam. Run by the College Board, AP courses give students the academic skills they need in college while providing more time to concentrate on the subjects that interest them.

What parents say

Testimonials

it is an amazing school, education, teachers, admissions, management all perfect. Very supportive teachers My son graduated recently ,he was very happy and successful, many thanks for all horizon school family .

I was a student at this school for 8 years and I had a great experience. Our school takes really good care of academics andwe occasionally have fun on the side. It offers a wide range of courses which helped me a lot when applying to universities.

Dedicated teachers and staff. They care about the students’ wellness. Parents feedback is always taken into consideration and any issues are resolved promptly.
